message.entry: Right hand side of the assignment must be [], or it must be a non-empty {0} object.
Horizontal concatenation of {0} objects is not permitted. Use ''vertcat'' instead.
Array formation of {0} objects is not permitted.
Inputs for concatenation must be {0} objects.
Individual {0} properties cannot be resized using indexing. You can resize the entire object using MATLAB indexing, or use vertcat to append to an existing object.
Input must be a valid axes handle.
Number of {0} elements must be one or it must match number of coordinates in LOCATION.
Size of points cannot be constant and empty.
